link.title: A+ Charter Schools

meta.name: description
meta.content: Tuition-free public charter schools in Dallas County, providing individualized education in a safe, family-like environment, with a strong support system in place to ensure that any student can be successful.

nav.a: Parent and Family Engagement Connection Newsletter

header.h2: A+ Charter Schools, Inc. will remain closed for the rest of the 2019-2020 school year

div.p:
A+ Charter Schools Family,
Moments ago, Greg Abbott, the Texas Governor made a public announcement that all Texas schools are to remain closed for the rest of the 2019-2020 school year. We will continue our At-Home learning and the “On the Go” serving of meals through the last day of the school year, May 22, 2020.
Familia de A+ Charter Schools,
Hace unos momentos, Greg Abbott, el Gobernador de Texas, hizo un anuncio público de que todas las escuelas de Texas permanecerán cerradas por el resto del año escolar 2019-2020. Continuaremos nuestro aprendizaje en el hogar y el servicio de comidas “On the Go” hasta el último día del año escolar, Mayo 22, 2020.
Please read the full story for more information.

div.style: position: absolute; overflow: hidden; left: 0px; top: 0px; width: 2500px; height: 1171px;

h1.a: A+ Charter Schools, Inc. will remain closed for the rest of the 2019-2020 school year

div.div:
A+ Charter Schools Family,
Moments ago, Greg Abbott, the Texas Governor made a public announcement that all Texas schools are to remain closed for the rest of the 2019-2020 school year. We will continue our At-Home learning and the “On the Go” serving of meals through the last day of the school year, May 22, 2020.
Familia de A+ Charter Schools,
Hace unos momentos, Greg Abbott, el Gobernador de Texas, hizo un anuncio público de que todas las escuelas de Texas permanecerán cerradas por el resto del año escolar 2019-2020. Continuaremos nuestro aprendizaje en el hogar y el servicio de comidas “On the Go” hasta el último día del año escolar, Mayo 22, 2020.
Please read the full story for more information.

img.alt: Our school buildings will remain closed through May 4, 2020 to support our community and health care professionals in the ongoing goal of containing the spread of the novel coronavirus, or COVID-19. Thumbnail Image

h1.a: Our school buildings will remain closed through May 4, 2020 to support our community and health care professionals in the ongoing goal of containing the spread of the novel coronavirus, or COVID-19.

div.div: Additionally, all extracurricular activities, practices and athletic events are suspended while we are closed. -A+ Academy Elementary, A+ Academy Secondary, Inspired Vision Academy Elementary & Inspired Vision Academy Secondary will serve a bagged breakfast and lunch to all students 18 yrs of age and younger. Read full story for more COVID-19 feeding information.
TO DEVELOP STUDENTS WITH INTEGRITY WHO ARE AWARE OF THEIR POTENTIAL AND ABLE TO OBTAIN HIGH GOALS THROUGH INNOVATIVE EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS.

Theda Green - Board President
Charles Oliver - Board Vice President
Linda Davis- Board Secretary
Ernest Crowly - Board Member
Diana Cruz-Board Member

Gene Walker - Board Member
Karen Belknap - Director Emeritus
